definition: shockingly repellent, people who are sick, eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
details:
adjective
- shockingly repellent
= synonyms: ghastly
- deeply affected by a strong feeling
= example: deeply affected by a strong feeling
- affected with madness or insanity
= synonyms: mad
- (of light) lacking in intensity or brightness
= synonyms: wan
- affected by an impairment of normal physical or mental function
= synonyms: ill
- feeling nausea
= synonyms: queasy, nauseated, nauseous, sickish
- having a strong distaste from surfeit
= synonyms: tired of
noun
- people who are sick
= example: people who are sick
verb
- eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
= synonyms: cast
